entry.title: Compatibility of parameter login/password_max_idle_initial = 14 with SAP Kernel release 754_600
entry.content:
Hello Team

Request your confirmation with checking the compatibility of SAP APAP Parameter login/password_max_idle_initial = 14 with SAP Kernel release 754_600.

We got an EWA Alert to set this parameter as 14 and currently we have our SAP Kernel Version as 754_600 and are planning to change the same on 29th August 2025 during our supply downtime window.

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Re: Compatibility of parameter login/password_max_idle_in...
entry.content:
Dear Customerя╝М

Regarding your question about the compatibility of the SAP profile parameter login/password_max_idle_initial = 14 with SAP Kernel release 754_600, we can confirm the following:

The parameter login/password_max_idle_initial is supported as of SAP NetWeaver 6.40 and later.
Since your kernel version is 754_600, which is significantly beyond this minimum requirement, the parameter is compatible and can be safely used in your environment.
Setting this value to 14 days is also in line with SAP EarlyWatch Alert recommendations, which aim to enforce stronger security around the validity of initial passwords.

For further details, please refer to SAP Note 862989.

Sincerely,
SAP Support
